title: Scallop, samphire, pickled dulse and clam broth
description: If you’re lucky enough to get hold of samphire, dulse (a type of seaweed) and fresh top-notch seafood, this is a wonderful recipe to capture the flavours of the sea.Equipment and preparation: You will need a food processor for this recipe.
ingredients: 30g/1oz spring onions, sliced finely and soaked in a bowl of water
15g/½oz pickling liquid from the dulse (from above)
20g/¾oz pickled dulse, plus a couple pieces for garnish (from above)
